overview_of_class: Research seminar, involving study and discussion of primary literature, will focus on thermodynamics of mineralogical phase relations. Topics may include roles in crust and mantle petrology, roles in crust and mantle dynamics, roles in seismogenesis, utility of numerical modeling, etc.
